    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname) throws NoMorePlayersException, AlreadyPresentPlayerException
      add a new player to the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player nickname
      Throws:
      NoMorePlayersException - thrown if the match is full
      AlreadyPresentPlayerException - thrown if the nickname is already taken in this match

    • selectCardFromDeck

      public void selectCardFromDeck​(java.lang.String name) throws InvalidCardException, NoMoreCardsException
      pick a card from the deck
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - thrown if the name given doesn't match with any card
      NoMoreCardsException - thrown if you can't pick others card

    • selectStarter

      public void selectStarter​(java.lang.String nickname) throws AlreadyChosenStarterException, InvalidNamePlayerException, NoPlayerException
      select the starting player by his nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the starting player nickname
      Throws:
      AlreadyChosenStarterException - thrown if the starting player has already been chosen
      InvalidNamePlayerException - thrown if the given name doesn't exists in the match
      NoPlayerException - thrown if there are no players
